title: TSMC’s slowing monthly sales fuel AI sustainability debate
description: Investors were jolted last week by a sudden slump in Asia’s technology shares, which served as a stark reminder that the world-beating rally in artificial intelligence and semiconductor stocks may be nearing a short-term crest.
content:
Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. reported slowing growth in monthly revenue, highlighting uncertainty over the sustainability of the AI boom even as industry behemoths including Nvidia Corp. chase more chip orders.

title: Kimi K2 Thinking Beats ChatGPT and Claude on Top AI Benchmarks
description: Moonshot AI’s latest model, Kimi K2 Thinking, has outperformed GPT-5 and Claude on key benchmarks like Humanity’s Last Exam and BrowseComp, reflecting China’s growing edge in artificial intelligence.
content:
Kimi K2 Launch
Beijing-based AI lab Moonshot unveiled Kimi K2 Thinking on Thursday. The company claims it outperforms GPT-5 and Claude Sonnet 4.5 on Humanity’s Last Exam, BrowseComp, and Seal-0, benchmarks testing reasoning, problem-solving, and onli... [1204 chars]

title: AI clouds up the economic dashboard
description: The return of U.S. economic data when Washington reopens may do little to clear up a macro picture that is clouded by the dash for artificial intelligence and compounded by trade distortions.
content:

title: Halper AI Launches to Transform the Future of SMEs From Digital Souls to Business Growth
description: SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Artificial intelligence is transforming industries worldwide. But for small and medium sized businesses (SMBs), the real challenge isn’t access to technology; it’s access to time. Today, Halper AI, founded by Eduard Gevorkyan, launches to address exactly that challenge, giving business owners back the hours they need to grow and thrive.
